ResourceHeader.Description:
The IMPACT Suprathermal Electron (STE) Telescope data 
consist of 10-sec resolution electron counts from each of 8 sensors in each 
of 32 energy bands that span 1.9 keV to 100 keV.  Only four sensors provide 
unsaturated data that are scientifically usable.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
Please acknowledge the IMPACT P.I., Janet Luhmann 
of UCB

NumericalData.Caveats:
The four sensors labelled "U" and numbered 1-4 are saturated
and should not be used.  Sensors providing usable data are labelled "D"
and are numbered 5-8.

Parameter.Name: Electron distribution function
Parameter.Description:
Electron counts in each of 32 energy bands between
1.9 keV and 100 keV, from each of 8 differently pointed but otherwise
similar sensors
